resources.string: Thanks to Volla & F(x)tec for developer devices
Failed to extract some data. Did you install the app on a SD card? Pressing OK will take you to the app, do not do anything without investigating first!
Android Boot Manager не доступен для этого устройства (%1$s).
Android Boot Manager is available for this device (%1$s).
Your device uses an BSP codename (%1$s). That means we are not able to identify your device and you need to select yours.
Похоже, вы не прочитали эту страницу. Это не есть хорошо!
ATTENTION! Failed to mount bootset! Please check logs and do not touch stuff!
Теперь вам будет предложено получить файл DroidBoot. Убедитесь, что он подходит для вашего устройства!
This looks like a zip file. You need to extract lk.img!
That does not look like an DroidBoot!
If you now press OK, ABM will install. This the last confirmation!

Код возврата - %1$sКогда код возврата равен \"ERROR\", что-то пошло не так. Пожалуйста, прошейте деинсталлятор и сообщите нам об этом в Telegram группе @andbootmgr. Не забудьте прикрепить логи по пути /sdcard/abm/install.log! Если код возврата равен \"OK\", установка прошла успешно. Теперь вы должны перезагрузиться.
У меня нет рут-прав. Что-то пошло не так!
Исходный код доступен здесь: %1$s\nREADME доступен здесь: %2$s
Отключить проверку на устройство (если вы подменили fingerprint)
Android Boot Manager не установлен на вашем устройстве!
It is only available for the Moto G5 (cedric) and for the Volla Phone (yggdrasil)!

ВЫ МОЖЕТЕ ПОТЕРЯТЬ СВОИ ДАННЫЕ! ВЫ МОЖЕТЕ \"БРИКНУТЬ\" СВОЁ УСТРОЙСТВО! ВЫ МОЖЕТЕ ПОТЕРЯТЬ СВОЙ IMEI (как и со всем на cedric)! ВЫ МОЖЕТЕ ПОТЕРЯТЬ СВОИ ДЕНЬГИ! ТОЛЬКО ВЫ НЕСЁТЕ ОТВЕТСТВЕННОСТЬ ЗА СВОИ ДЕЙСТВИЯ! ВЫПОЛНЯЙТЕ НА СВОЙ СТРАХ И РИСК!
ATTENTION: If you now click OK, all data on that SD card will be LOST
This operating system installer is unsupported.
The storage is currently in use. Often does Android auto-mounting or your SD card is formatted as Internal Storage. Please make sure it is not used (mounted or even modified)
No storage device with ABM metadata was found but you need one for this. If you have one, press \"Format\". If there is no \"Format\" button there was no compatible storage found.
Config file name (No spaces, no file extension)
You cannot delete your primary ROM!
Android Boot Manager установлен успешно, но приложение всё ещё в разработке, пустые разделы и бесполезные кнопки не исключены. :(
Ubuntu Touch (System image, Halium Boot image, Rootfs)
Ubuntu Touch (System image, Halium Boot image)
You are going to install ubuntu touch, using system image and halium boot. Are you sure?
You are going to install ubuntu touch, using system image, rootfs and halium boot. Are you sure?
You are going to install SailfishOS, using zip. Are you sure?
One phone to start them all!
You are about to update the bootloader.
You are about to install an ROM to the SD card.
Ready! Please follow the next steps for installing Android Boot Manager. If you redecided, you can click cancel. Nothing was changed until now.
Ready! Please follow the next steps for installing your ROM. If you redecided, you can click cancel. Nothing was changed until now.

Welcome to the Android Boot Manager installer. This will install Android Boot Manager on your device. Not easily undoable modifications are being done, please do not install without knowledge about it. Disclaimer follows:
This SD card uses the legacy MBR partition scheme but GPT is required. However, it can be converted to GPT. But this may cause data loss, therefore please backup your data.

Please select an unused partition on your SD card configured with the following type: %1$s. Please make sure it really is the correct one, you can cancel and label it if unsure. If you didn\'t create one yet, do that first.
